data.title: eX710M Multi-purpose HMI from Exor Electronic
data.meta_description: The eX710M Graphical Workstation is available for purchase today. We have specs, lead time, and pricing. Servo2Go excels at robotic and mechatronic solutions.
data.text:
The eX710M by EXOR International sets a new standard in the world of automation. Whether you're in search of a high-performance HMI, a flexible PLC, or a reliable gateway, this device encompasses all three, ensuring seamless performance across a multitude of tasks. The eX710M is not just about power; it's designed with precision in mind.

At its heart lies a formidable 64-bit quad-core CPU. This ensures that JMobile applications, a cornerstone of EXOR's offerings, run at peak performance, free from latency. Its high-resolution multitouch PCAP glass display is not just visually stunning but is also built to last. Whether it's exposure to UV rays, chemical interactions, or just the everyday wear and tear, the screen remains unscathed.

With a range of certifications, the eX710M is tailored for both factory settings and extreme environments where equipment robustness is paramount. Its adaptability makes it a key player in diverse work settings.

Technical Highlights:
